body: Rule 34 bruv, there's always a doujin for everyone, You know what would be great? A doujin with a lore like you said, what's better than that? that the lore could be copy pasted by other authors with their own unique character design -_-, there's a doujin for everything bruv, No need to be mad just because you can't find the specific doujin that suites your taste and complain about it here

Kind of a bummer to see these copy-paste doujins coming out. I mean I get that these aren't going to exactly be high literature, but that doesn't mean we can't have interesting stories and characters. You know what would be a cool dynamic? A high school student and loli pairing. Not just a little sister situation, but where he has conflicting friends and people who ask him out and he has to hide it or something. And they actually love each other too. I haven't seen one yet, but there are probably ones out there.
I like how squishy she looks. Otherwise mid.
Damn this shit is mid asf.
Chiguchi makes good doujins but this one's mid at best
Man everything that's been getting uploaded recently feels the same.
